name: DateIntervalFormatter.Style
desc: Formatting styles for individual date and time values.

items.name: case none
items.desc: No information for the date or time. Use this style when you do not want to include date or time information in the resulting string.

items.name: case short
items.desc: An abbreviated date or time format.

items.name: case medium
items.desc: A medium length date or time format.

items.name: case long
items.desc: A long length date or time format.

items.name: case full
items.desc: A fully spelled out date or time format.
